report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Make/Model]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Location of Damage:**
- The rear passenger side window of the vehicle has sustained significant damage.

**Type of Damage:**
- The rear passenger side window is shattered into numerous pieces. The damage appears to be caused by an external impact, possibly from a rock or other object striking the window.

**Description of Damage:**
- The window glass is completely broken, with jagged edges and fragments scattered around the area where the window was once intact.
- The frame of the window shows signs of stress and potential damage, indicating that the window may have been forced open or hit with considerable force.
- There is no visible damage to the door panel or any other part of the vehicle's exterior.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has sustained damage to the rear passenger side window. The extent of the damage requires immediate attention and repair to ensure the safety of the vehicle and its occupants.

**Recommendation:**
- Contact a qualified auto glass repair professional to replace the shattered window.
- Inspect the rest of the vehicle for any additional damage that may not be immediately apparent.
- Document the damage thoroughly for insurance purposes.

**Prepared By:**
[Your Name]  
[Your Title]  
[Insurance Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Date:**
[Insert Date]
